Text:
This is brilliant!  Thank you for this I will leave my copies for seeding for a long time.  I was only 9 when I first saw this.  I even built a spaceship in the back yard.  I almost have a tear in my eye ... sniff sniff.

Do you have the old SF Soapy The Ark?  Circa 1973??  About a space ship going to another star system carrying the remains of Earth people.  There is an accident and the The is now heading AT a star and there is no one at the helm.
